title: How do I delete or lock a message in a conversation? How do I delete multiple messages in batches?
answer:
Go to Messaging and touch a conversation to display all messages in the conversation. Touch and hold the message you want to lock. From the displayed option menu, touch Lock. 

 On the Messaging screen, touch Menu. From the displayed option menu, touch Delete. Choose the conversation you want to delete. You can also delete conversations in batches.
